dict.acceptation: （用以询问某人或某事物的词）什么，多少；…的事物；
（用以表示不相信或惊奇）；（用以表示未听清楚对方说的话）；

sent.orig: What has happened?; What's the matter?; What has occurred?; What took place?; What has come about?; Has something come up?; What's up with (sb. and sth.)?
What time is it now?; What is the time?; Have you the right time?; Can you tell me the time?; What o'clock is it?; What time do you like it?; What do you make the time?
A good student must connect what he reads with what he sees around him.
sent.trans: 一个好学生应该将他读到的东西与他在周围看到的东西联系起来。

sent.orig: By feeling we tell what is hard from what is soft.
Even four horses cannot take back what one has said.; What has been said cannot be unsaid.
